plot outline: Dabba Aise Paise portrays the fight to keep a small Marathi school going. Nana Chaudhary who is the Head Master, struggles to save the dilapidated school, but loses the battle. Having seen his loss, his daughter, who is a teacher in an English medium school, resigns from her job and starts teaching in the Marathi school. Her joining the school rejuvenates the fight to save the school.
title: Dabba Ais Pais

Her joining the school rejuvenates the fight to save the school.
